document_data.mainbody:
Losing Fai is an adventure module set in the Forgotten Realms using the Dungeons & Dragons 5 edition ruleset. It is part of the Avernus Rising series of adventures published for the D&D Adventurers League. It focuses on Avernus, and is an adventure designed for 5- to 10-level characters.
Burney • Dara • Elliach • Fai Chen • FhetAhla • Immiass • Mahadi • Su Zhen Kang • Zal Furden
Zariel
amnizu • barbazu • black abishai • copper dragon • flameskull • hamatula • hellwasp • human • incubus • imp • night hag • quasit • rakshasa • shadow demon • spinagon • vrock • wraith

Calimshan • Elturel • Turmish

Wandering Emporium
